[ar:A$AP Ferg]
[al:Still Striving (Explicit)]

[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Plain Jane (质朴无华的女子) (Explicit) - A$AP Ferg
[00:03.05]Lyrics by：Darold Brown/Kirlan Labarrie/Paul Beauregard/Jordan Houston
[00:06.10]Composed by：Darold Brown/Kirlan Labarrie/Paul Beauregard/Jordan Houston
[00:09.16]Yeah
[00:09.36]
[00:11.34]Ride with the mob Alhamdulillah
[00:14.13]Check in with me and do your job
[00:16.33]
[00:16.93]Ferg is the name Ben Baller did the chain
[00:19.79]Tourneau for the watch presi Plain Jane
[00:22.53]Yamborghini chain rest in peace to my superior
[00:25.40]Hermès link could feed a village in Liberia
[00:28.07]TMZ taking pictures causin' mad hysteria
[00:30.99]Momma see me on BET and started tearin' up
[00:33.83]I'ma start killin' n***as how you get that trife
[00:36.24]I attended Harlem picnics where you risked your life
[00:39.08]Uncle used to skim work sellin' nicks at night
[00:41.92]I was only 8 years old watching Nick at Nite
[00:44.72]Uncle Psycho was in that bathroom buggin'
[00:47.73]Knife to his guts hope Daddy don't cut him
[00:50.60]Suicidal thoughts brought to me with no advisory
[00:53.42]He was pitchin' dummy sellin' fiends mad ivory
[00:56.35]Grandma had the arthritis in her hands bad
[00:59.15]She was poppin' pills like rappers in society
[01:01.96]I'll f**k yo' b***h for the irony
[01:03.84]
[01:04.59]I'll send Meechy at yo' ho if yo' b***h keep eyein' me
[01:07.56]Ride with the mob Alhamdulillah
[01:10.47]Check in with me and do your job
[01:13.29]Ferg is the name Ben Baller did the chain
[01:16.13]Tourneau for the watch presi Plain Jane
[01:18.94]Ride with the mob Alhamdulillah
[01:21.74]Check in with me and do your job
[01:24.51]Ferg is the name Ben Baller did the chain
[01:27.46]Tourneau for the watch presi Plain Jane
[01:29.95]
[01:31.79]Suck a n***a d**k or somethin'
[01:33.15]
[01:34.47]Suck a n***a d**k or somethin'
[01:35.71]
[01:37.32]Suck a n***a d**k or somethin'
[01:38.59]
[01:40.16]Suck a n***a d**k or somethin'
[01:41.36]
[01:41.87]I'ma explain why you probably never seen me
[01:44.31]I'm in a sunken place no Instagram I'm watchin' TV
[01:46.99]I think I trade my breakfast lunch and dinner for some kitty
[01:49.84]Please believe me I see RiRi I'ma eat it like panini
[01:52.63]I go dumb up in the broad hit the walls like graffiti
[01:55.58]Indian burns all up on a n***a wee-wee
[01:58.39]I think I need a foursome Bella Kendall Gigi
[02:01.09]It'd be easy if Reneezy hook it all up on the leezy
[02:03.98]I go crazy in my Yeezy Kirk Kneezy on the beat
[02:06.82]I told 'em now we finna glow up in the street
[02:09.66]Rappers talk subliminal but they don't talk to me
[02:12.38]Put 'em in a Jersey shore like Pauly D
[02:14.87]
[02:15.48]Ride with the mob Alhamdulillah

data.trans:
[ti:Plain Jane (Explicit)]
[ar:A$AP Ferg]
[al:Still Striving (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:03.05]//
[00:06.10]//
[00:09.16]//
[00:09.36]
[00:11.34]与暴徒为伍 感谢真主
[00:14.13]跟着我 加入队伍 做好你的分内事
[00:16.33]
[00:16.93]Ferg是我的大名 戴着Ben Baller为我量身打造的大金链子
[00:19.79]Tourneau的手表 外表平平无奇
[00:22.53]戴上刻着Yamborghini的项链 逝者安息 我的精神领袖
[00:25.40]爱马仕的手链价值连城 可以养活利比里亚一个村子的人
[00:28.07]TMZ拍的照片引发轰动
[00:30.99]妈妈看见我站上BET的领奖台 她喜极而泣
[00:33.83]我的说唱技巧秒杀众人 你是如何拿到入场券的
[00:36.24]我在Harlem如鱼得水 可你在这里出生入死
[00:39.08]我叔叔以前常常翘班 晚上出去兜售**
[00:41.92]当时我只有8岁 只有看着尼克国际儿童频道的节目来打发时间
[00:44.72]叔叔躲在浴帘后面发疯
[00:47.73]锋利的刀子把他吓坏了 恳求爸爸不要伤害他
[00:50.60]我萌生自杀的念头 没有人开解我
[00:53.42]他倒卖假货
[00:56.35]奶奶患有严重的关节炎
[00:59.15]她药不离手 吃完之后说唱歌手一样嗨翻天
[01:01.96]我去你的 带着你的讽刺滚远点
[01:03.84]
[01:04.59]如果你一直看着我 我一定让你离不开我
[01:07.56]与暴徒为伍 感谢真主
[01:10.47]跟着我 加入队伍 做好你的分内事
[01:13.29]Ferg是我的大名 戴着Ben Baller为我量身打造的大金链子
[01:16.13]Tourneau的手表 外表平平无奇
[01:18.94]与暴徒为伍 感谢真主
[01:21.74]跟着我 加入队伍 做好你的分内事
[01:24.51]Ferg是我的大名 戴着Ben Baller为我量身打造的大金链子
[01:27.46]Tourneau的手表 外表平平无奇
[01:29.95]
[01:31.79]做别人的跟屁虫 贪得无厌
[01:33.15]
[01:34.47]做别人的跟屁虫 贪得无厌
[01:35.71]
[01:37.32]做别人的跟屁虫 贪得无厌
[01:38.59]
[01:40.16]做别人的跟屁虫 贪得无厌
[01:41.36]
[01:41.87]让我向你解释 为什么你看不到我
[01:44.31]我呆的地方没有网络 只能看看电视 
[01:46.99]和美女共处 体验美妙滋味 让我欲罢不能
[01:49.84]相信我 我刚刚看到了蕾哈娜 如此媚惑我心
[01:52.63]我像是遭受重击 沉迷其中 
[01:55.58]双手就紧紧抓住 不愿放开
[01:58.39]我想来个刺激的四人体验
 像Bella Kendall Gigi 这三女孩
[02:01.09]要是Reneezy能把她们拿下就好了
[02:03.98]多么疯狂 我脚踩传说中说唱第一鞋 跟着节奏摆动
[02:06.82]我告诉她们 我们会在街上亲热
[02:09.66]饶舌手自然而然谈起话来 却从不对我说
[02:12.38]带她们去泽西海岸玩乐 就像明星保利
[02:14.87]
[02:15.48]与暴徒为伍 感谢真主
[02:18.21]跟着我 加入队伍 做好你的分内事
[02:21.03]Ferg是我的大名 戴着Ben Baller为我量身打造的大金链子
